1370: Cecilia was born in Helle voet in 1370.
Got married to Radulphus at age 18 in 1370.
Gave birth to Gisele in 1370 at age 18.
1374: Gave birth to Anthonius in 1374 at age 22.
1375: Gave birth to Folqui in 1375 at age 23.
1377: Gave birth to Badeloghen in 1377 at age 25.
Lost daughter Folqui when Folqui was 3 years old.
1378: Gave birth to Werenboud in 1378 at age 26.
1379: Gave birth to Verthwi in 1379 at age 27.
1380: Lost son Werenboud when Werenboud was 3 years old.
1382: Gave birth to Heylewigis in 1382 at age 30.
1385: Gave birth to Diewiven in 1385 at age 33.
Lost daughter Diewiven when Diewiven was 1 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1387: Gave birth to Sipper in 1387 at age 35.
1392: Gave birth to Rolekine in 1392 at age 40.
1395: Lost daughter Gisele when Gisele was 26 years old.
1396: Lost daughter Badeloghen when Badeloghen was 20 years old.
